spiritsExplanation: The video titled "20 Minute Guided Meditation with Jon Kabat-Zinn PhD" is fundamentally aligned with the "Soothing & Restorative" spirit. The presence of a guided meditation session, especially with Jon Kabat-Zinn, a renowned figure in mindfulness and stress reduction, signifies a focus on relaxation and healing. The description highlights Jon Kabat-Zinn's contributions to mindfulness in medicine and society, which supports a restorative emphasis. Channel information underscores this by presenting itself as a platform for learning meditation for mental well-being. Comments reinforce this classification, with users describing personal transformative experiences, improved mental states, and peace achieved through regular meditation practice. The structured simplicity without 'mumbo jumbo' further underlines the essence of soothing mindfulness. Other spirits like "High-Energy & Intense" or "Sport & Agility" were not considered as the content is clearly relaxation-centered.
